main.description: List economicEvents. Filterable by: action, inputOf, outputOf, resourceInventoriedAs, toResourceInventoriedAs, provider, receiver, corrects, settles, fulfills, satisfies, realizationOf, reciprocalRealizationOf.

uri.description: Fetch a single record by AT-URI. Other filters are ignored when set.

inputOf.description: Filter by inputOf (AT-URI of referenced record).

outputOf.description: Filter by outputOf (AT-URI of referenced record).

resourceInventoriedAs.description: Filter by resourceInventoriedAs (AT-URI of referenced record).

toResourceInventoriedAs.description: Filter by toResourceInventoriedAs (AT-URI of referenced record).

provider.description: Filter by provider (DID of referenced agent).

receiver.description: Filter by receiver (DID of referenced agent).

corrects.description: Filter by corrects (AT-URI of referenced record).

settles.description: Filter where settles array contains this AT-URI.

fulfills.description: Filter where fulfills array contains this AT-URI.

satisfies.description: Filter where satisfies array contains this AT-URI.

realizationOf.description: Filter by realizationOf (AT-URI of referenced record).

reciprocalRealizationOf.description: Filter by reciprocalRealizationOf (AT-URI of referenced record).

limit.description: Maximum number of records to return.

cursor.description: Pagination cursor from a previous response.
